name: Odd Dicey
description:
For best results, please play fullscreen.

Move through areas and try to make it to the exit by facing your obstacles correctly.

Use varied movements to properly align the faces of your die in a constrained area.


Created by: Severencir, Hono Tsukaima

Assets Used:

A few personally created shapes
"Dice" by Arthur: https://opengameart.org/content/dice
Fonts by Thaleah: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/fonts/free-pixel-font-thaleah-140059
Skybox by Avionx: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/skybox-series-fr...
Sounds by Lumino: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/nature-sound-fx-180413
Models/art by Meshint: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/meshtint-free-tile-map-mega-toon-series-153619
Models by Chlyang:https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vegetation/plants/lowpoly-flowers-47083
UI by Kvazi: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/icons-ui-95116
Music by VGcomposer: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/action-rpg-music-free-85434
Models by Acorn Bringe: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/simplistic-low-poly-nature...
Music by GWriterStudio: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/8bit-music-album-051321-196147
